ygData.subject: Re: Spell Tactics.
ygData.msgSnippet: My Complete spell tactics for solo Use pet, buff a lot. Find bad guy, draw with tashan. To lower MR? Not really, it is just a low taunt, low cost spell to get
ygData.messageBody:
My Complete spell tactics for solo

Use pet, buff a lot.
Find bad guy, draw with tashan. To lower MR? Not really, it is just a
low taunt, low cost spell to get the guy over, and he will switch to my
pet instantly after.
Once pet is on, spin, go up and choke, and whack, back up, spin, go up
and whack,
Lather rinse repeat.
Not much to strategy here =) But this kill sabout everything.

Get into trouble? Do not underestimate color flux! if you get stuck
behind two guys at once, and are having trouble casting, here is what I
do:

SOLO:
In trouble? Color Flux, they are stunned, gate, out of trouble
instantly.

GROUP:
Colr Flux, Mez one, spin the other and whack on it.


> -----Original Message-----
> From: Wizard LABBS [SMTP:wizard-labbs@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, May 12, 1999 1:12 PM
> To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqenchanters] Spell Tactics.
>
> I would like to compile a list of spell tactics that can be used
> either Solo or in a group. Basically, what spell combinations do you
> use, do you cast spells in conjunction with any other spell caster,
> Ect.. Basically expand on the post about what spells do you have
> memorized in your eight slots. Why do you use the ones that you do and
> wnat neat combinations have you found.
> ∩┐╜
> Thanks
> Mushin
> ∩┐╜
